nodes.text: The Warcarrier was a bomber model manufactured by Elsinore-Cordova Engineering for the Galactic Republic that saw use during the Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. Primarily a drone bomber, the Warcarrier carried drones, laser cannons, and various missiles or torpedoes depending on its loadout.

The Warcarrier is one of the four bomber models available to Republic players in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Galactic Starfighter, a 2013 Digital Expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. It costs 5,000 Fleet Requisition to unlock, and is the Republic faction's drone bomber, deploying repair, missile, and sentry drones. Its Imperial counterpart is the B-4D Legion.
